sentence.text: Mutations in branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis have been reported in schizencephaly and porencephaly combined with microbleeds or calcifications, often associated with ocular and renal abnormalities, myopathy, elevated creatine kinase levels and haemolytic anaemia.

entity.text: branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis

sentence.text: In this study, we aimed to clarify the phenotypic spectrum of branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis/A2 mutations in the context of cortical malformations that include schizencephaly, polymicrogyria and/or heterotopia

entity.text: branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis
